Articles.Content:
I'm a streamer, and I think it would be fun to have some Kerbal Gestures for when out on EVA. Things like: Thumbs Up; Touchdown Dance; Maybe an RCS assisted back flip, and whatever else Squad-ies and perhaps people here in the forums could come up with.

Now, I'm sure we can get a few hundred (at least) recommendations here in this forum thread, but really a few different celebratory gestures (so it wouldn't be the same one all the time) would be cool.

When I started this post, I was thinking of something like the number keypad to pick the different gestures, and something like that would be really cool... However, just a random gesture or one related to Courage and Stupidity would be neat (but then I suppose, if one didn't change Kerbals, the gesture wouldn't change ... Keypad would probably be better.)

Anyway, thanks for reading!

Gestures, poses (not momentary, for screenshots), idle animations, yes, it would be nice to have them in as it would make things a bit more alive. Hopefully we'll get something like that in some future release although I don't think it's very high priority yet.

I always thought that it'd be cool to have unfocused kerbals on EVA wander around and look busy while you're working with a different one. They could poke at rocks, pull out tools, build sandcastles. As long as they don't throw themselves off cliffs or use any thruster fuel, there's practically no limit to what they could be doing.

Well, saluting a just planted flag would be awesome too.

On a different note: I always want stranded Kerbals to build a little shelter a camp fire when marooned on Kerbin.
